title: Is Hindi music better than English music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music is central to most nations. Germans love German music. Italians love Italian music. India has many different music styles - Hindi music is just one of them. Why does any music have to better and others inferior? If you love one kind of music, if you feel good listening to it, it’s good. It doesn’t mean other music is bad, or less good. It’s a purely personal choice.
